I was really impressed that a live action move was made about the Halo Franchise.  This was something done when 343 took over, something I am glad they did.  For those who don't know this is before and during the start of the Covenant War.  In some books these characters are portrayed and Master Chief as well.  The acting was indeed well played, and I enjoyed watching Master Chief have Lady Luck always on his side.(Halo fans will get this).  scene4all I thank you for this awesome and superior movie.  Thank you.
